title: Deep terror zyra
body:
Passive becomes a great anemone and her skill shot is a swordfish
Q a small coral appears which then grows into a big coral when it explodes
W can also be an anemone for accuracy but for fun it could be a treasure chest
E can be piles of pollution from under the sea
R unleashes the kraken

E plants are octopus arms that slap as attacks
Q plants are squid like plants that shoot out black ink

Zyra herself can be similar to the haunted zyra but evidently colour  change (dark blue and zeal)

replies.body: Would it be as sexy as Giant Enemy Crabgot? If so, you have my support!
